```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor) 
library(scales)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
#what companies have the most complaints?
library(dplyr)
complaints %>% 
  count(company, sort = TRUE)
```
```{r}
#What state had the most complaints?
library(dplyr)
complaints %>% 
  count(state, sort = TRUE)

```
```{r}
#what type of complaints occured the most often?
library(dplyr)
complaints %>% 
  count(product, sort = TRUE)
```
